xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.22 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika, Hetuduka » 1.22.1 Hetupada » 1.22.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Tika, Hetuduka
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika, Hetuduka
Hetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
237.
899Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
900Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
901(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
238.
902Anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
903Anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
904Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
905(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< 1.22.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup1.22.2 Nahetupada >>
